duties_responsibilities.duty: Take ownership of the end-to-end experience for digital platforms, working closely with product managers.
Create beautiful, usable solutions based on unbiased user research, setting strategic design direction for financial suite of products.
Lead the product team through the user-centered design process with collaborative workshops for discovery and ideation.
Apply user research insights to drive product design and strategy, and execute user research in collaboration with internal stakeholders.
Advocate for a Human-Centered Design process and creating a collaborative environment, engaging and inspiring the product organization about customers' experiences.
Own UX design and mentor less experienced designers, playing an active role in advocating for a Human-Centered Design process.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in user experience, human-computer interaction, interaction design, service design, graphic design, or digital design-related degree (Master's preferred)
Additional Bachelor's in sociology, anthropology, psychology, or related degree
